content: our beloved pups come in all different shapes and sizes take some time to measure your dog and then use this fully customisable pattern to make a jumper perfectly tail-ored for your four-legged friend this free guide will take you through the steps to make a pawfect jumper i have included a table with a description of all the measurements you need to make with space to fill in your pup s details the pattern is written in us crochet terminology if you have questions pleased get in touch via my instagram @crafter ele please visit my website at https //sites google com/view/crafterele/free-patterns/bespoke-doggie-jumper happy crafting
